Stone Idol

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 347
heretic [heretic]: 3
national discount [nationrebate]: #72 MA Na'Ba - Queens of the Desert

Requires 10E10S to forge (E2S2)

A stone crafted in the image of a false god. The power of the idol will draw the attention of the faithful and they will worship the stone image as if it were their lord and master. People across the entire province in which the idol is located will abandon their former faith and the Dominion of any Pretender God will be reduced.
